categories.name: Rosetta Code Example - Man or Boy Test
categories.description: A benchmark for determining the runtime of a Wikibooks / Rosetta Code example under many different kinds of languages.

data_groups.name: Custom C++ Class
data_groups.description: The use of a custom-written C++ class with operator() in the Man or boy tests.

data_groups.name: Lambdas
data_groups.description: The use of C++-style lambdas in the Man or boy tests. Uses templates to never erase the type: hard-codes recursion limit.

data_groups.name: Lambdas (No Function Helpers)
data_groups.description: The use of C++-style lambdas in the Man or boy tests. Uses templates to never erase the type: hard-codes recursion limit, uses no regular helper functions.

data_groups.name: Lambdas (std::function)
data_groups.description: The use of C++-style lambdas in the Man or boy tests. Wraps the lambdas in a std::function.

data_groups.name: Lambdas (std::function_ref)
data_groups.description: The use of C++-style lambdas in the Man or boy tests. Wraps the lambdas in a std::function_ref.

data_groups.name: Lambdas (Rosetta Code)
data_groups.description: The use of C++-style lambdas in the Man or boy tests.

data_groups.name: Normal Functions (Rosetta Code)
data_groups.description: The use of plain C functions in the Man or Boy tests. Modifies the function arguments list to transfer data.

data_groups.name: Normal Functions (Statics)
data_groups.description: The use of plain C functions with statics for data transfer in the Man or Boy tests.

data_groups.name: GNU Nested Functions
data_groups.description: The use of the GNU Nested Functions C extension for the Man or Boy tests.

data_groups.name: GNU Nested Functions (Rosetta Code)
data_groups.description: The use of the GNU Nested Functions C extension for the Man or Boy tests.

data_groups.name: Apple Blocks
data_groups.description: The use of the Apple Blocks extension for the Man or Boy tests.
